purpose: Curate and integrate open-source projects for the DingTalk platform to enhance its functionalities and ecosystem.
principle: Aggregates various open-source projects and tools that are compatible with DingTalk, providing a centralized resource for developers and users.
reusability: Offers a collection of projects that can be integrated into DingTalk, serving as a resource hub for developers looking to extend DingTalk capabilities.
limitations: Dependent on the quality and maintenance of individual projects; primarily a collection rather than a singular tool or framework.
name: awesome-dingtalk-integration
description: 钉钉平台优秀开源项目集合
